info.sourceTextContent: Veces veíala aparecer detrás de las vidrieras; veces, conviniéndose de antemano por intermedio de Casilda, salía de la ciudad e iba a sentarse sobre un canto, frente al lienzo de muralla que correspondía a su mansión, hasta verla asomar entre almena y almena.
info.suspiciousTextContent: One appeared sometimes appear behind the windows, sometimes, agreeing in advance through Casilda, out of the city and went to sit on a ridge, front of the wall that corresponded to his mansion, to see it hovering between turret and battlements.
